'''Delusion Factory''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Archon Quest]] [[Chapter II]]: Act III - [[Omnipresence Over Mortals]] quest ''[[Delusion (Quest)|Delusion]]''.

==Walkthrough==
# Go north to room 1 and defeat the enemies.
#* Beware of falling traps on the way.
# Pick up the 1st amulet from the altar to the West.
# Go east and take the elevator down to room 2 and defeat the enemies.
# Pick up the 2nd amulet from the altar to the West.
#* There is an '''Exquisite Chest''' to the South.
# Climb up the ladder to the north into a hallway with Electro traps.
#* There is an '''Exquisite Chest''' in the area with Electro floor panels.
# Take the elevator up, then jump/glide back and forth between elevators until you reach the top.
# Go south into another hallway with Electro traps.
# Pick up the 3rd amulet from the altar at the end of the hallway.
# Glide down back to room 1 and open the door with the amulets.
# Go into room 3 and defeat the 2 waves of enemies.
